name: Home Delivery Service (HODS)
ibcm: 11.02.01 Sales Order Capture / 08.01.03 Sales Order Management

name: Backup for iSell cash and carry sales
Maintain Sales Space dimensioning from calculated recommendation
Manage and control of Sales Spaces
Manage base data for sales steering of Products based on turnover and margin
Manage regular sales price on Business Unit/Channel level
Manage loyalty customer sales price on Business Unit/Channel level
Defines the range available for selling on business unit level
Integration point for range and price information
Manage local / global activities and promotions
Support all IKEA approved integration mechanisms
Convert from one mechanism to another
Client tools to be able to access backups
Operational reporting
notes: Each move out takes its operational reporting
